content:
TITLE: Creating LiveKit access token using CLI
DESCRIPTION: Command to generate a JWT access token for authenticating users connecting to a LiveKit room. The token encodes user identity and permissions for room access.
SOURCE: https://github.com/livekit/livekit/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
lk token create \
    --api-key devkey --api-secret secret \
    --join --room my-first-room --identity user1 \
    --valid-for 24h
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Simulating a test publisher in LiveKit
DESCRIPTION: CLI command to join a LiveKit room and publish a demo video stream, useful for testing without a real camera. This simulates a participant with looped video content.
SOURCE: https://github.com/livekit/livekit/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
lk room join \
    --url ws://localhost:7880 \
    --api-key devkey --api-secret secret \
    --identity bot-user1 \
    --publish-demo \
    my-first-room
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing LiveKit on MacOS using Brew
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the LiveKit media server on MacOS using the Homebrew package manager. Homebrew is a popular way to install software on MacOS. Ensure that Homebrew is installed before running this command.
SOURCE: https://github.com/livekit/livekit/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
brew install livekit
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing LiveKit on Linux using Curl
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the LiveKit media server on Linux systems. It downloads and executes a shell script from the LiveKit website. This script automates the installation process. Be cautious when running scripts downloaded from the internet.
SOURCE: https://github.com/livekit/livekit/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
curl -sSL https://get.livekit.io | bash
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting up LiveKit with placeholder API credentials
DESCRIPTION: Default API key and secret used when running LiveKit server in development mode with the --dev flag.
SOURCE: https://github.com/livekit/livekit/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
API Key: devkey
API Secret: secret
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building LiveKit server from source
DESCRIPTION: Steps to clone the LiveKit repository and build the server from source code. Requires Go 1.23+ and properly configured GOPATH environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/livekit/livekit/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/livekit/livekit
cd livekit
./bootstrap.sh
mage
```
